hanzi-su-wiki:
統

Значения

Прерываться, прекращаться; пресекать, уничтожать; прерывать; нарушать, разрушать; очень; наибольшая длина, обрубать, прекращать

Мнемоника

Нарезать 刀 нитки 糸 кусками стандартной 巴 длины.

Варианты

统

heisig_chinese_memo: Spidey doesn't have a normal job so he has more than sufficient time to do what he likes since the bad guys usually attack at night. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: overall, thread, spiderman, allot, infant, toddler, top hat, elbow, human legs
koohiiStory1: Spidey is alloted the biggest crime fighter jurisdiction in NYC because his OVERALL arrest record is the best.
koohiiStory2: According to Greek mythology, there´s a thread alloted to everyone, and its length is the overall determinant of your fate.
jp_example_words:
統合(とうごう): integration, unification, synthesis
統治(とうじ): rule, reign, government, governing
統制(とうせい): regulation, control
統率(とうそつ): command, lead, generalship, leadership
系統(けいとう): system, family line, lineage, ancestry, geological formation
大統領(だいとうりょう): president, chief executive
伝統(でんとう): tradition, convention
統一(とういつ): unity, consolidation, uniformity, unification, compatible
統計(とうけい): statistics
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You take all of your thread and allocate them into one place to unite them. You wrap all the thread together into a giant thread ball. Now it's a big, united mess!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Allocate all of your thread like you would your cash: by uniting it! Not at a bank, but in a big, intertwined lump.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You're busy trying to unite all of your thread, twisting and tying and wrapping, and suddenly you look at the ball in your hands and see とうきょう. You've united this thread into the shape of とうきょう. There are even little pins for all the famous neighborhoods and tourist spots. This is strange, because you don't remember putting them there.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Try to do this yourself at home. Unite all of your thread and poof! There's とうきょう!
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 銃 (つつ、ジュウ ружьё, пистолет).
Ru_Radicals: 亠 (крышка), 儿 (ножки), 厶 (значок МУ), 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 糸 (нить)
Ru_trainchinese:
tǒng: (графема) взаимосвязанная система; трубкообразная часть предмета (вариант 筒)
tǒng: (глаг/нареч) объединять, обобщать; править, контролировать; сполна, полностью
Kanshudo_mnemonic: your allotted (充) thread (糸) is to govern
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A sweater is a continuum of threads in a sufficient quantity.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "糸", " filling " sound, the original meaning is the thread of silk. "Shu Wen": "Ji Ye. From Shitou, full of sound." "Huinanzi·Tai Clan Xun": "The nature of cocoon is silk, but if the worker's daughter cooks hot soup and draws the rule, it cannot become silk. "

" Unification " can mean a system, that is, a continuous relationship between things. "The Second King of Mencius and Lianghui": "A gentleman will start his own business for success."

" Unification " also means standards. "Xunzi·Chen Dao": "Faithfulness is the quality, goodness is unified, etiquette is literary, and morality is rational."

" Unification " also means unification. "The First Year of Gongyang Zhuan‧ Yin": "What is it about Wang Zhengyue? Great unification."

" Control " can mean control. "Yi·Qian": "Great Qianyuan, the beginning of all things and materials, is the ruler of the sky." Kong Yingdashu: "The one who rules the sky, starts with its perfect health, and thus can rule the sky."

Governance and management are also represented by " unification ". "Xunzi ‧ Qiangguo": "If it is unified, it is no different from Jie Zhou, and if you want to have Tang Wu's fame, is it possible?" Yang Yan's note: "Unification, control and governance."

" Tong " also means umbrella. Jin Panyue's "Sheng Fu": "Each one guards one to respond to it, and the ruler thinks the Sheng."

" Tong " is also used as a quantifier. Yuan Liu Zhi "Duan Zhenghao‧ Shang Gao Supervisor": "Build an ancestral hall for support, and set up a unified stele with several lines."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of "糸" and " filling ", the original meaning is the thread of silk.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「充」聲，本義為絲的頭緒。《說文》：「紀也。从糸，充聲。」《淮南子‧泰族訓》：「繭之性為絲，然非得工女煮以熱湯而抽其統紀，則不能成絲。」

　　「統」可表示系統，即事物之間一脈相承的連續關係。《孟子‧梁惠王下》：「君子創業垂統，為可繼也。」

　　「統」還表示準則。《荀子‧臣道》：「忠信以為質，端愨以為統，禮儀以為文，倫類以為理。」

　　「統」也表示統一。《公羊傳‧隱公元年》：「何言乎王正月？大一統也。」

　　「統」可表示統率。《易‧乾》：「大哉乾元，萬物資始，乃統天。」孔穎達疏：「乃統天者，以其至健而為物始，以此乃能統領於天。」

　　治理、管理也以「統」表示。《荀子‧強國》：「若其所以統之，則無以異於桀紂，而求有湯武之功名，可乎？」楊倞注：「統，制治也。」

　　「統」亦表示總括。晉潘岳〈笙賦〉：「各守一以司應，統大魁以為笙。」

　　「統」還用作量詞。元劉致〈端正好‧上高監司〉：「蓋一座祠堂人供養，立一統碑碣字數行。」
humanum_short_description: 從「糸」，「充」聲，本義為絲的頭緒。

從「 糸 」，「 充 」聲，本義為絲的頭緒。《說文》：「紀也。从糸，充聲。」《淮南子‧泰族訓》：「繭之性為絲，然非得工女煮以熱湯而抽其統紀，則不能成絲。」 「 統 」可表示系統，即事物之間一脈相承的連續關係。《孟子‧梁惠王下》：「君子創業垂統，為可繼也。」 「 統 」還表示準則。《荀子‧臣道》：「忠信以為質，端愨以為統，禮儀以為文，倫類以為理。」 「 統 」也表示統一。《公羊傳‧隱公元年》：「何言乎王正月？大一統也。」 「 統 」可表示統率。《易‧乾》：「大哉乾元，萬物資始，乃統天。」孔穎達疏：「乃統天者，以其至健而為物始，以此乃能統領於天。」 治理、管理也以「 統 」表示。《荀子‧強國》：「若其所以統之，則無以異於桀紂，而求有湯武之功名，可乎？」楊倞注：「統，制治也。」 「 統 」亦表示總括。晉潘岳〈笙賦〉：「各守一以司應，統大魁以為笙。」 「 統 」還用作量詞。元劉致〈端正好‧上高監司〉：「蓋一座祠堂人供養，立一統碑碣字數行。」
From " 糸", " filling" sound, the original meaning is the thread of silk. "Shu Wen": "Ji Ye. From Shitou, full of sound." "Huinanzi·Tai Clan Xun": "The nature of cocoon is silk, but if the worker's daughter cooks hot soup and draws the rule, it cannot become silk. " " Unification" can mean a system, that is, a continuous relationship between things. "The Second King of Mencius and Lianghui": "A gentleman will start his own business for success." " Unification" also means standards. "Xunzi·Chen Dao": "Faithfulness is the quality, goodness is unified, etiquette is literary, and morality is rational." " Unification" also means unification. "The First Year of Gongyang Zhuan‧ Yin": "What is it about Wang Zhengyue? Great unification." " Control" can mean control. "Yi·Qian": "Great Qianyuan, the beginning of all things and materials, is the ruler of the sky." Kong Yingdashu: "The one who rules the sky, starts with its perfect health, and thus can rule the sky." Governance and management are also represented by " unification". "Xunzi ‧ Qiangguo": "If it is unified, it is no different from Jie Zhou, and if you want to have Tang Wu's fame, is it possible?" Yang Yan's note: "Unification, control and governance." " Tong" also means umbrella. Jin Panyue's "Sheng Fu": "Each one guards one to respond to it, and the ruler thinks the Sheng." " Tong" is also used as a quantifier. Yuan Liu Zhi "Duan Zhenghao‧ Shang Gao Supervisor": "Build an ancestral hall for support, and set up a unified stele with several lines."

統字的基本解释

統
tǒng
见“统”。

統字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tǒng］
［《廣韻》他綜切，去宋，透。］
“统1”的繁体字。
(1)丝的头绪。
(2)事物之间一脉相承的连续关系，系統。
(3)纲纪；准则。
(4)统一。
(5)统领；率领。
(6)治理；管理。
(7)本。
(8)总括；总起来。
(9)量词。多用于碑碣。
(10)旧谓一千五百三十九年为一统。
(11)地质学名词。在世的时间内形成的地层叫“统”。
(12)犹通。穿通。
(13)犹通。泄露。
(14)犹通。全，都。
(15)用同“筒”。衣服等的筒状的部分。
(16)用同“筒”。亦指把手缩在袖统里的动作。
(17)姓。见《广韵·去宋》。

統字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　統； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页924第02
【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?他綜切，音?。【說文】統，紀也。【釋名】統，緒也，主緒人世，類相繼如統緒也。【書·微子之命】統承先王，修其禮物。【傳】與時王?通三統。【疏】天有三統，土有三王。三王者，所以統天下也。【公羊傳·隱元年】大一統也。【註】統者，始也。總繫之辭。　又【韻會】吐孔切【正韻】他總切，?音桶。義同。　又【易·乾卦】乃統天。【釋文】統，本也。　又【書·周官】冢宰掌邦治，統百官。【傳】統理百官。　又【周禮·天官·大宰】以八統詔王馭萬民。【註】統，所以合率以等物也。　又【齊語】班序顚毛，以爲民紀統。【註】統，猶經也。　又【史記·樂書】樂統同。【註】統，領也。　【廣韻】又姓。　又【正韻】他貢切，音痛。義同。

統字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
統字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tǒng］
["Guangyun" he comprehensively cuts, goes to Song, through. ]
The traditional characters of "統1".
(1) The thread of silk.
(2) The continuous relationship and system between things.
(3) Guidance; Guidelines.
(4) Unification.
(5) Command; lead.
(6) Governance; management.
(7) This.
(8) To sum up; to sum up.
(9) Quantifiers. Mostly used for monuments.
(10) The old saying that the year of fifteen hundred and thirty-nine is unification.
(11) Geological terms. The stratum formed during the lifetime is called "Tong".
(12) Yutong. Pass through.
(13) Yutong. Give way.
(14) Yutong. all.
(15) Use the same "tube". The cylindrical part of clothes.
(16) Use the same "tube". It also refers to the action of retracting the hands in the sleeves.
(17) Last name. See "Guangyun·Go to Song".

tǒng
вм. 统
Radicals: 糸, 充  (thread, allocate)
Meaning Mnemonic
You take all of your thread and allocate them into one place to unite them. You wrap all the thread together into a giant thread ball. Now it's a big, united mess!
Allocate all of your thread like you would your cash: by uniting it! Not at a bank, but in a big, intertwined lump.
Reading Mnemonic
You're busy trying to unite all of your thread, twisting and tying and wrapping, and suddenly you look at the ball in your hands and see とうきょう. You've united this thread into the shape of とうきょう. There are even little pins for all the famous neighborhoods and tourist spots. This is strange, because you don't remember putting them there.
Try to do this yourself at home. Unite all of your thread and poof! There's とうきょう!
